item.title: Why Is BBAI Stock Falling Today?
item.description: The stock fell nearly 6% in Wednesday morning’s trade before making a partial recovery at the time of writing.

item.title: Duolingo Stock Dips After Citigroup Lowers Price Target – Here’s What The Analyst Said About Duocon Event
item.description: Citigroup maintained a ‘Buy’ rating and noted that Duolingo's product announcements this year had a lower profile relative to the past.

item.title: Gorilla Technology Stock Soared Nearly 10% Today – Here’s An Update
item.description: The company announced a partnership with Singapore-based infrastructure firm Freyr, signing a three-year agreement valued at $1.4 billion.

item.title: Fed Meeting Today: Will The Central Bank Cut Interest Rates? Here's What Experts And Retail Users Think
item.description: The two-day meeting of the Federal Reserve is already underway, with the outcome scheduled to be announced on Wednesday at 2 p.m. ET.

item.title: ZenaTech’s ZenaDrone Subsidiary Commences Testing of Its IQ Square Drone for Public Safety and Emergency Response Applications, a USD $5.5 Billion Market
